mapper.select: SELECT rt.PID, tcp.MACHINE, tcp.REMOTE_ADDRESS, mstbrn.BRANCH_NAME, def.STREET, def.CITY, mststt.NAME FROM RT_TAB rt INNER JOIN TCP_TAB tcp ON rt.PID=tcp.PID INNER JOIN DEF_TAB def ON rt.PID=def.ID INNER JOIN BRANCH_TAB mstbrn ON def.BRANCH=mstbrn.BRANCH_ID INNER JOIN MST_STATE mststt ON def.STATE=mststt.ID ORDER BY rt.PID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RT_TAB(PID, ETYPE, OWNER, FORMATER, MONITOR, OFFLN, PROTO) VALUES (#{pid}, #{etype}, #{owner}, #{formater}, #{monitor}, #{offln}, #{proto})

INSERT INTO TCP_TAB(MACHINE, PID, REMOTE_ADDRESS, REMOTE_PORT, LOCAL_PORT, INITIATOR, DEPENDS_ON, FORMAT, HEADER_LEN, PING_CHECK) VALUES (#{machine}, #{pid}, #{remoteAddress}, #{remotePort}, #{localPort}, #{initiator}, #{dependsOn}, #{format}, #{headerLen}, #{pingCheck})

INSERT INTO DEF_TAB(ID, TID, BRANCH, D1BILL, D2BILL, D3BILL, D4BILL, D1VAL, D2VAL, D3VAL, D4VAL, D1TYPE, D2TYPE, D3TYPE, D4TYPE, NUMDISP, BWARN, REC, RWARN, DWARN, RJWARN, TIME1, TIME2, TIME3, TIME4, TERMCHAR, STREET, CITY, STATE, CIRCUIT, ACCT, TCHAR, LUNO, GMT_OFFSET, MACING, SECURITY_MOD, ECP, LOADER) VALUES (#{id}, #{tid}, #{branch}, #{d1bill}, #{d2bill}, #{d3bill}, #{d4bill}, #{d1val}, #{d2val}, #{d3val}, #{d4val}, #{d1type}, #{d2type}, #{d3type}, #{d4type}, #{numdisp}, #{bwarn}, #{rec}, #{rwarn}, #{dwarn}, #{rjwarn}, #{time1}, #{time2}, #{time3}, #{time4}, #{termchar}, #{street}, #{city}, #{state}, #{circuit}, #{acct}, #{tchar}, #{luno}, #{gmtOffset}, #{macing}, #{securityMod}, #{ecp}, #{loader})

INSERT INTO CTLA_TAB (PID, HCSTART, HCSENT, RENCON, CTYPE, OUTCTR, OUTTOT, TTYPE, TTO, LAMT, LDISP, LAUTH, LSCREEN, NTRANS, RESPNO, ACCT1TP, ACCT2TP, OPSTAT, PROCSTAT, HCMORE, DISAB1, DISAB2, OPROB, WARN1, WARN2, CMDWT, MEM_NO, MIS_FLD1, MIS_FLD2, LCARDTYPE, HREJECT, AREJECT, CLOSED, MISERR, STAT1_1, STAT1_2, STAT1_3, STAT1_4, STAT1_5, STAT1_6, STAT1_7, STAT1_8, STAT1_9, STAT1_10, STAT2_1, STAT2_2, SW_TAB, SW_SKEY, SW_LSKEY, SW_EKEY, SW_REQ, SW_CONFIG, MIS_FLAG1, MIS_FLAG2, LUTRNNO, NON_READIES, STATUS_MSG) VALUES (#{pid}, #{hcstart}, #{hcsent}, #{rencon}, #{ctype}, #{outctr}, #{outtot}, #{ttype}, #{tto}, #{lamt}, #{ldisp}, #{lauth}, #{lscreen}, #{ntrans}, #{respno}, #{acct1tp}, #{acct2tp}, #{opstat}, #{procstat}, #{hcmore}, #{disab1}, #{disab2}, #{oprob}, #{warn1}, #{warn2}, #{cmdwt}, #{memNo}, #{misFld1}, #{misFld2}, #{lcardtype}, #{hreject}, #{areject}, #{closed}, #{miserr}, #{stat11}, #{stat12}, #{stat13}, #{stat14}, #{stat15}, #{stat16}, #{stat17}, #{stat18}, #{stat19}, #{stat110}, #{stat21}, #{stat22}, #{swTab}, #{swSkey}, #{swLskey}, #{swEkey}, #{swReq}, #{swConfig}, #{misFlag1}, #{misFlag2}, #{lutrnno}, #{nonReadies}, #{statusMsg})

INSERT INTO CTR_TAB (PID, C1_START_BILLS, C2_START_BILLS, C3_START_BILLS, C4_START_BILLS, C_CTRANS, C_C1BILLS, C_C2BILLS, C_C3BILLS, C_C4BILLS, C_CWDL_LOC, C_CWDL_US, C_CDEP, C_CPMT, C_CINQ, C_CCKBK, C_CXFER, C_CCAPT, C_CRECT, C_C1BREJ, C_C2BREJ, C_C3BREJ, C_C4BREJ, C_CDEPAC, C_CACSHA, C_CAXFER, C_CAINQ, C_CICSHA, C_CIXFER, C_CIINQ, C_TWDL_LOC, C_TWDL_US, C_TWDLC_LOC, C_TWDLC_US, C_TWDLS_LOC, C_TWDLS_US, C_TACSHA_LOC, C_TACSHA_US, C_TICSHA, C_TDEP, C_TDEPC, C_TDEPS, C_TPMT, C_TPMTL, C_TPMTMC, C_CFSEG, C_CFRF, C_CSVCLOAD, C_TSVCLOAD, C_CSVCUNLOAD, C_TSVCUNLOAD) VALUES (#{pid}, #{c1StartBills}, #{c2StartBills}, #{c3StartBills}, #{c4StartBills}, #{cCtrans}, #{cC1bills}, #{cC2bills}, #{cC3bills}, #{cC4bills}, #{cCwdlLoc}, #{cCwdlUs}, #{cCdep}, #{cCpmt}, #{cCinq}, #{cCckbk}, #{cCxfer}, #{cCcapt}, #{cCrect}, #{cC1brej}, #{cC2brej}, #{cC3brej}, #{cC4brej}, #{cCdepac}, #{cCacsha}, #{cCaxfer}, #{cCainq}, #{cCicsha}, #{cCixfer}, #{cCiinq}, #{cTwdlLoc}, #{cTwdlUs}, #{cTwdlcLoc}, #{cTwdlcUs}, #{cTwdlsLoc}, #{cTwdlsUs}, #{cTacshaLoc}, #{cTacshaUs}, #{cTicsha}, #{cTdep}, #{cTdepc}, #{cTdeps}, #{cTpmt}, #{cTpmtl}, #{cTpmtmc}, #{cCfseg}, #{cCfrf}, #{cCsvcload}, #{cTsvcload}, #{cCsvcunload}, #{cTsvcunload})

INSERT ALL
INTO CTIM_TAB(TIMR_NO, TIMR_LEN, PID) VALUES (#{elem.timrNo}, #{elem.timrLen}, #{elem.pid})
select * from dual

INSERT ALL
INTO ATM_CURRENCY_TAB(ISO_CURRENCY_TYPE, CANISTER_TYPE, PID) VALUES (#{elem.isoCurrencyType}, #{elem.canisterType}, #{elem.pid})
select * from dual

INSERT ALL
INTO ECFOP_TAB(EOP_NO, EOPT, PID) VALUES (#{elem.eopNo}, #{elem.eopt}, #{elem.pid})
select * from dual
INSERT INTO DEV_KEY_TAB(PID, DIRECTION, KEY_LENGTH, PCI_COMPLIANT, PINBLK_FMT) VALUES (#{pid}, #{direction}, #{keyLength}, #{pciCompliant}, #{pinblkFmt})
INSERT INTO TMK_COMP_TAB(SEQUENCE, ORGDEV, FORMED) VALUES (#{id.sequence}, #{id.orgdev}, #{formed})
INSERT INTO TMK_REQ_TAB(ORGDEV, BRANCHC, STATUS) VALUES (#{orgdev}, #{branchc}, #{status})
